Documentation.long_help: This filter will flip ImageData on any of the three cartesian axii. A checkbox is provided for each axis on which you may desire to flip the data.
Documentation.short_help: This filter will flip ImageData on any of the three cartesian axii. A checkbox is provided for each axis on which you may desire to flip the data.

IntVectorProperty.name: OutputDataSetType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property determines the dataset type for the output of the programmable filter.

IntVectorProperty.name: reverse_x_dir
IntVectorProperty.label: reverse x dir
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Reverse all data along the X-axis

IntVectorProperty.name: reverse_y_dir
IntVectorProperty.label: reverse y dir
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Reverse all data along the Y-axis

IntVectorProperty.name: reverse_z_dir
IntVectorProperty.label: reverse z dir
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Reverse all data along the Z-axis

StringVectorProperty.name: Script
StringVectorProperty.default_values:
from PVGPpy.filt import reverseGridAxii pdi = self.GetInput() # vtkImageData image = self.GetOutput() # vtkImageData
# Make user selection iterable axes = [reverse_x_dir, reverse_y_dir, reverse_z_dir]
reverseGridAxii(pdi, axes=axes, pdo=image)
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property contains the text of a python program that the programmable source runs.
